data.title: Open call for bands: be the opening act for OneRepublic Baltic shows
data.meta_description: Musicians and bands from the Baltics, this is your chance to shine in front of big crowds and surprise OneRepublic fans. Apply for the opening act spot!
data.text:
Musicians and bands from the Baltics, this is your chance to shine in front of big crowds and surprise OneRepublic fans. Apply for the opening act spot!

We, bobe.me in cooperation with L Tips Agency (LV and EE) and Medusa Concert (LT), invite bands from Latvia, Lithuania and Estonia to participate in a OneRepublic warm-up act contest for a chance to be the opening act for all three shows in the Baltics.

One of the most popular American pop-rock music bands OneRepublic will perform in Kaunas on May 18th, Riga on May 20th and Tallinn May 21st.

Unique opportunity to be chosen by the famous American band and discovered across music fans in the Baltics. Are you ready to show what you got on a big stage?

Here is how to participate: Send your application to info@bobe.me with a “OneRepublic opening act” in the subject line. In the message include the following:

• Short bio in English about your band

• 2 videos. Link to your live show video and official music video (YouTube/Vimeo or via file transfer service)

• Describe in 1-2 sentences what your band will add to the show

• Attach promo photos of your band (horizontal and vertical format)

Application deadline - April 14th!

And the winner is…

From all the applications received by April 14th 3 bands will be selected by public fan voting and the jury of contest organisers – bobe.me, L Tips Agency and Medusa Concert. 3 top picks will be presented to OneRepublic band who will choose their favourite. Winner will be announced on April 30th.

NB! Please note that by sending an application your band agrees to enter this competition, and in case of being chosen as the opening act for OneRepublic, will cover your own travel, technical and any additional expenses for performances in all three Baltic concerts.

Mark your 2022th with an exciting experience! Share this with your band and apply!
